decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.

Reason: In order to comply with Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, as amended by Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: [Unnumbered location plan, EX01, EX02, EX03, EX04, EX05, EX06, EX07, EX08, EX09, EX10, P01, P02, P03, P04, P05, P06, P07, P08, P09, P10, fire strategy received 13/11/2021].
Reason: In order to ensure the development is carried out in accordance with the planning permission.

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building, unless otherwise shown on the approved plans.
Reason: In order to safeguard the appearance of the area.

Condition : 4 - The windows formed in the northern-eastern elevation shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.
Reason: To prevent overlooking of the nearby premises in accordance with policy SC7 Residential extensions and alterations of the adopted Local Plan.

Condition : 5 - The external sound level emitted from plant, machinery or equipment at the development shall be lower than the lowest existing background sound level by at least 10dBA in order to prevent any adverse impact. The assessment shall be made in accordance with BS4142:2014+A1:2019 at the nearest and/or most affected noise sensitive premises, with all machinery operating together at maximum capacity.
A post installation noise assessment shall be carried out to confirm compliance with the sound criteria and additional steps to mitigate noise shall be taken, as necessary. Approved details shall be implemented prior to occupation of the development and thereafter be permanently retained.
Reason: To ensure that the amenity of occupiers of the surrounding premises is not adversely affected by noise from plant equipment.
description: Demolition of existing rear and side and erection of single storey wrap around extension with pergola and first storey rear extension to the house. Replacement of all existing windows and front door, installation of air-conditioning unit at rear ground floor and addition of window and door on side elevation
